author: Richard Read (feedback@highgearmedia.com)
title: Uber's self-driving software fails about once per mile
text: Remember how Uber launched a fleet of self-driving vehicles in San Francisco last December, and the California Department of Motor Vehicles flipped out because the company hadn't applied for the proper $150 permit and shut down the program within a week? Turns out, the DMV was right to be concerned. Documents obtained by Recode show that Uber's...
